name: Tooffers
description:
Love Tooffers? Then download Tooffers on your android to unleash even more features.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MADEntertainment.Dots

Features:

- Fun and addictive game play.
- Two different modes with more coming in future.
- Timed mode: Race against the clock to score as much as you can.
- Moves mode: Play relaxed and build your strategy to pop as many Tooffers as you can.
- Awesome Graphics
- Beautiful Music and fun sound FX.
- Earn power-ups by popping more tooffers and use them to sky rocket your numbers.
